translation.en: Now, this is exactly the type of performance you would expect to see
translation.zh: 这就是我们 在国际大学生阿卡贝拉锦标赛中

translation.en: at the International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
translation.zh: 最希望看到的表演

translation.en: -Am I right, Gail? -Oh!
translation.zh: 我说的对不对 盖尔

translation.en: John, you're so right, everything else seems wrong.
translation.zh: 约翰 你说得太对了 对到不能再对了

translation.en: [John] Boy, these Barden University Treblemakers always thrill the judges.
translation.zh: 天 这些巴登大学的骚乱制造者 总是能让评委为之震撼

translation.en: And the ladies in the room cannot get enough.
translation.zh: 让女士们都欲罢不能

translation.en: So true, John.
translation.zh: 让女士们都欲罢不能 太对了 约翰

translation.en: Nothing makes a woman feel more like a girl than a man who sings like a boy.
translation.zh: 没有比歌唱的少年 更能让女人重回少女的了

translation.en: Chloe, look at you. You're a mess. You're unfocused. You're unreliable.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 瞅瞅你 一团糟的样子 注意力也不集中 真是靠不住

translation.en: And your breath smells like egg. Like, all the time.
translation.zh: 还一直都有口臭

translation.en: I can't believe the Bellas
translation.zh: 不敢相信等我们毕业了

translation.en: are being passed on to you two slut bags after we graduate.
translation.zh: 不敢相信等我们毕业了 贝拉团要交给你们两个废物女

translation.en: Just don't eff up your solo.
translation.zh: 不要把独唱唱砸

translation.en: I won't disappoint you.
translation.zh: 不要把独唱唱砸 我不会让你失望的

translation.en: My dad always says, "If you're not here to win,
translation.zh: 我爸常说 如果你赢不了

translation.en: get the hell out of Kuwait."
translation.zh: 就滚出科威特吧

translation.en: Has your dad ever told you to shut up?
translation.zh: 你爸有没有常让你闭嘴

translation.en: I'm fine. ♪ Please don't stop the music ♪
translation.zh: 我很好

translation.en: Ouch! Boy, that hurt.
translation.zh: 天啊 那下肯定很痛

translation.en: [Gail] Sexy man-splits.
translation.zh: 性感的男生劈腿

translation.en: [John] His pain is our gain, Gail.
translation.zh: 他的疼痛带来了欢乐 盖尔

translation.en: All right, good luck, guys!
translation.zh: 好了 祝你们好运

translation.en: Oh! Good luck out there!
translation.zh: 祝你们演出顺利

translation.en: Seriously, you girls are awesome…ly horrible.
translation.zh: 说真的 你们这群姑娘超级 烂

translation.en: I hate you. Kill yourselves. Girl power! Sisters before misters!
translation.zh: 我恨你 你去死吧 女孩力量 女士优先

translation.en: All right, ladies, it's now or never. Hands in!
translation.zh: 好了 姑娘们 成败在此一举了 伸手

translation.en: [all] One, two…
translation.zh: 一 二

translation.en: Up now, the Barden Bellas!
translation.zh: 接下来 巴登贝拉团

translation.en: [John] Well, the Bellas tonight are making history
translation.zh: 今晚贝拉团将创造新历史

translation.en: as the first ever all-female group to advance to the ICCA finals.
translation.zh: 她们是历史上第一支 挺入ICCA决赛的全女子团

translation.en: [Gail] That's right, John. Why do you think it's taken so long
translation.zh: 没错 约翰 你认为是什么让全女子团体

translation.en: for an all-lady group to break through that a cappella glass ceiling?
translation.zh: 花了这么久打破 阿卡贝拉阳盛阴衰的局面

translation.en: Well, Gail, the women, typically, cannot hit the low notes,
translation.zh: 盖尔 很明显的一点是 女性很难唱低音

translation.en: which really round out an arrangement, thrill the judges,
translation.zh: 低音在编排中很重要 也能让评委为之一振

translation.en: and that can really hurt them in competition.
translation.zh: 这点让她们在比赛中非常吃亏

translation.en: Women are about as good at a cappella as they are at being doctors.
translation.zh: 女人就不适合阿卡贝拉 跟她们不适合当医生一样

translation.en: One, two, three, four.
translation.zh: 一二三四

translation.en: Ooh, is it me or did we just take a left turn into Snoozeville?
translation.zh: 是只有我一个人 还是大家都左转去了瞌睡村

translation.en: Yeah, and we parked in a lot where they do not validate.
translation.zh: 是的 这个村子里的停车位 已经不够用了

translation.en: -No! -Holy…
translation.zh: 不 天啊

translation.en: This is a surprise!
translation.zh: 好大个惊喜

translation.en: -Now this is how your bring excitement… -[John] It never happened.
translation.zh: 还从来没发生过这种事 你们就是这样给国际大学生

translation.en: …to the International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
translation.zh: 阿卡贝拉锦标赛带来惊喜的

translation.en: She had a week's worth of lunch and lost it.
translation.zh: 她这礼拜吃的饭都白吃了

translation.en: She didn't lose it. We know exactly where it is.
translation.zh: 没白吃 我们都参观到了

translation.en: -It's all over the third row. -Oh, no. Oh, no…
translation.zh: -前三排都是 -不…

translation.en: I got it. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我自己来 谢谢

translation.en: Hi there! Welcome to Barden University. What dorm?
translation.zh: 你好 欢迎来到巴登大学 哪个宿舍的

translation.en: Uh, Baker Hall, I think.
translation.zh: 贝克楼 大概吧

translation.en: Okay. What you're gonna do is you're gonna go down this way,
translation.zh: 好 那你顺着这条路一直走下去

translation.en: you're gonna take a right and you go through…
translation.zh: 然后右拐 穿过那些双开门

translation.en: Your campus map.
translation.zh: 给你校园地图

translation.en: And your official BU rape whistle.
translation.zh: 还有巴大防狼口哨

translation.en: Don't blow it unless it's actually happening.
translation.zh: 没事不要乱吹

translation.en: You must be Kimmy Jin. I'm Beca.
translation.zh: 你是吉米金吧 我是贝卡

translation.en: No English?
translation.zh: 不会英语

translation.en: Yes English?
translation.zh: 会英语

translation.en: Just tell me where you're at with English.
translation.zh: 告诉我你英语什么程度了

translation.en: There he is. I'm Benji. You must be Jesse.
translation.zh: 他来了 我是本杰 你肯定是杰西了

translation.en: And you must be kidding. Wow!
translation.zh: 开玩笑的吧

translation.en: Looking at it now, I can see that it's a bit much.
translation.zh: 这么看 感觉有点过了

translation.en: I can take it down.
translation.zh: 我可以摘下来的

translation.en: No, no way. I mean, it took a second for my eyes to adjust,
translation.zh: 不 别摘 我就是需要适应适应

translation.en: but I can roll with this.
translation.zh: 我还是可以接受的

translation.en: Look, just so you know, I'm not a total nerd.
translation.zh: 听着 跟你说 我不是彻头彻尾的书呆子

translation.en: I also happen to be super into close-up magic.
translation.zh: 我还非常擅长近景魔术

translation.en: Dude, that's awesome!
translation.zh: 哥们 太棒了

translation.en: How long was that little guy in there?
translation.zh: 这小家伙在里面憋多久了

translation.en: Several days.
translation.zh: 有几天了

translation.en: [man] Hey, this is campus police. Hide your wine coolers.
translation.zh: 我是校警 把你们的冷酒器都藏好了

translation.en: Just, uh… It's your old man making a funny.
translation.zh: 只是你老爸跟你开个玩笑而已

translation.en: Chris Rock, everybody.
translation.zh: 克里斯洛克 见过各位

translation.en: Hey, you must be Beca's roommate.
translation.zh: 你好 你是贝卡的室友吧

translation.en: I'm Dr. Mitchell, Beca's dad.
translation.zh: 我是米切尔博士 贝卡的爸爸

translation.en: I teach Comparative Literature here.
translation.zh: 我在这教比较文学

translation.en: So, [clears throat] when did you get here? How did you get here?
translation.zh: 你什么时候到的 你怎么来的

translation.en: -Took a cab. -[Dr. Mitchell] Mmm. Didn't wanna inconvenience you and Sheila.
translation.zh: 打出租车 不想麻烦你和茜拉

translation.en: How is the stepmonster?
translation.zh: 那个怪兽后妈怎么样了

translation.en: [scoffs] She is fine, thank you for asking.
translation.zh: 她很好 谢谢你问候她

translation.en: She's actually in Vegas at a conference--
translation.zh: 其实她在拉斯维加斯参加会议

translation.en: Oh, no, Dad, I don't actually care. I just wanted to say "stepmonster."
translation.zh: 别说了 爸 我根本不关心 我只是想叫她怪兽后妈

translation.en: So, uh, have you guys been out on the quad yet?
translation.zh: 你们在校园里逛过了吗

translation.en: In the springtime, all the students study on the grass.
translation.zh: 春天的时候 学生们都在草坪上学习的

translation.en: I don't wanna study on the grass, Dad.
translation.zh: 不想去草坪上学习 爸

translation.en: I need to move to LA and get a job at a record label
translation.zh: 我要搬到洛杉矶 在唱片公司找个工作

translation.en: and start paying my dues.
translation.zh: 然后自己养活自己

translation.en: [Dr. Mitchell] Yeah, here we go again. You know, Beca,
translation.zh: 又来了 你知道的 贝卡

translation.en: DJing is not a profession, it's a hobby.
translation.zh: DJ不是职业 是爱好

translation.en: Unless you're Rick Dees or someone awesome.
translation.zh: 除非你是瑞克迪斯 或者其他什么大人物

translation.en: That's not… I… [groans]
translation.zh: 这不是…我…

translation.en: I wanna produce music. I wanna make music, Dad.
translation.zh: 我要创作音乐 我想做音乐 爸爸

translation.en: But you're going to get a college education first.
translation.zh: 但是你要先上完大学

translation.en: For free, I might add. End of story.
translation.zh: 免费的 我再说一句 不用说别的了

translation.en: I'm going to the Activities Fair.
translation.zh: 我去参加游园会了

translation.en: Me, too. I'm going to the Activities Fair with my super-good friend, Kimmy Jin.
translation.zh: 我也 去参加游园会了 跟我超好的朋友吉米金一起

translation.en: [men chanting] Taking names, taking numbers. Join our righteous frat.
translation.zh: 留名字 留电话 加入我们的正义兄弟会

translation.en: If you ain't pledging Sigma Beta, you ain't worth no crap.
translation.zh: 不是西格玛贝塔 那你不算啥

translation.en: -That's a double negative. -That's a lot of negatives.
translation.zh: 这是双重否定句 这里否定的多了

translation.en: Follow me. There's only one group on this campus worth joining.
translation.zh: 跟我走 这学校里值得加入的 只有一个社团

translation.en: As far as Barden goes, that's what being a man's all about.
translation.zh: 巴登存在一天 那里就是男人最想去的地方

translation.en: The Treblemakers.
translation.zh: 骚乱制造者

translation.en: The rock stars of a cappella, the messiahs of Barden.
translation.zh: 阿卡贝拉中的摇滚巨星 巴登的救世主

translation.en: Well, you know, not including athletes, frat guys, or actual cool people.
translation.zh: 当然不包括运动员 兄弟会的或者真酷的人

translation.en: Organized nerd singing. This is great.
translation.zh: 书呆子组团唱歌 太好了

translation.en: Yeah, it makes so much sense. How's your voice?
translation.zh: 对 非常有道理 你歌喉怎么样

translation.en: Oh, nice.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: I will stop at nothing to take those ding-a-lings down.
translation.zh: 打败这群怪胎的决心无可阻挡

translation.en: Hey, Barb. You gonna audition this year? We have openings.
translation.zh: 芭芭 今年想来试音吗 我们在找人

translation.en: Oh, now that you've puked your way to the bottom,
translation.zh: 你一吐到底之后

translation.en: you might actually consider me?
translation.zh: 才想起来考虑我吗

translation.en: I auditioned for you three times and never got in
translation.zh: 我面试了三次 你都不收我

translation.en: because you said my boobs look like baloney.
translation.zh: 因为你说我的胸像熏肠

translation.en: The word's out. Bellas is the laughing stock of a cappella.
translation.zh: 大家都在说 贝拉团已经成为阿卡贝拉的笑柄

translation.en: Good luck auditioning this year. Douche-b's.
translation.zh: 祝你们今年招新愉快 贱女人

translation.en: Oh, my God. This is a travesty.
translation.zh: 天啊 这简直太荒谬了

translation.en: God, if we can't even recruit Baloney Barb, then we can't get anybody.
translation.zh: 天啊 如果我们连 熏肠芭芭都招不进来 那就招不到人了

translation.en: Just take the dramatics down a notch, okay? Hi, do you wanna…
translation.zh: 别小题大做好吗 你好 想加入…

translation.en: You're the one who got us into this hot mess.
translation.zh: 我们这样都是你害的

translation.en: Oh, we'll be fine.
translation.zh: 我们会好起来的

translation.en: I am confident that we will find
translation.zh: 我有信心我们可以找到八位

translation.en: eight super-hot girls with bikini-ready bodies
translation.zh: 身材姣好的热辣女郎

translation.en: who can harmonize and have perfect pitch. Okay?
translation.zh: 能合音还有完美音准 好吗

translation.en: Hi, would you like to be a member of…
translation.zh: 你好 想加入…

translation.en: Just keep flyer-ing. We have tradition to uphold.
translation.zh: 继续发传单 我们得坚持传统

translation.en: How about we just get good singers?
translation.zh: 直接找几个好歌手如何

translation.en: -What? Good singers? What? -Hi.
translation.zh: 什么 好歌手 -什么 -你好

translation.en: -[Chloe] Can you sing? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你会唱歌吗 -当然

translation.en: -Can you read music? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -识谱吗 -当然

translation.en: -Can you match pitch? -Try me.
translation.zh: -能听唱音阶吗 -试试

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -That was a really good start. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 这个开端挺吉利的

translation.en: I'm the best singer in Tasmania. With teeth.
translation.zh: 我是塔斯马尼亚岛的最佳歌手 还有满口牙

translation.en: -Love it. -What's your name?
translation.zh: -大爱 -你叫什么

translation.en: Fat Amy.
translation.zh: 肥艾米

translation.en: Um… You call yourself Fat Amy?
translation.zh: 你叫自己肥艾米

translation.en: Yeah, so twig bitches like you don't do it behind my back.
translation.zh: 对 这样你们这种贱人 就不能背后编排我了

translation.en: I will see you in auditions, Fat Amy.
translation.zh: 我们试音见 肥艾米

translation.en: I can sing but I'm also good at modern dance,
translation.zh: 我不仅会唱歌 还会跳现代舞

translation.en: olden dance, and, uh, mermaid dancing,
translation.zh: 古典舞和人鱼舞

translation.en: which is a little different.
translation.zh: 这个非常与众不同

translation.en: You usually start on the ground.
translation.zh: 通常开始在地面

translation.en: -It's a lot of floor work. -[Aubrey] I see that.
translation.zh: -很多地板动作 -我看出来了

translation.en: Oh, yeah, DJs. Deaf Jews.
translation.zh: DJ 聋犹太

translation.en: Shalom!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: That's not a real word but keep trying.
translation.zh: 都不是话 你们继续努力

translation.en: You will get there.
translation.zh: 会成功的

translation.en: Not a lot of Jewish people where you're from?
translation.zh: 你家乡没什么犹太人吧

translation.en: No. I did do Fiddler on the Roof, though, in high school.
translation.zh: 没有 不过高中的时候 我表演过《屋顶上的提琴手》

translation.en: It was, like, me and some Aboriginals. It was really Jewish.
translation.zh: 有我和土著居民们 特别犹太风

translation.en: It was full-on Jew.
translation.zh: 犹太风十足

translation.en: Hey, guys. [chuckles] All right, I'll give you my number.
translation.zh: 小伙子们 行啦 我的号码给你们好了

translation.en: Oh, what about her?
translation.zh: 她怎么样

translation.en: Ooh, ooh. I don't know. She looks a little too… alternative for us.
translation.zh: 不知道 感觉对我们来说 她太非主流了

translation.en: Hi, any interest in joining our a cappella group?
translation.zh: 你好 想加入我们的 阿卡贝拉社团吗

translation.en: Oh, right, this is, like, a thing now.
translation.zh: 知道 这个现在还挺红的

translation.en: Oh, totes. We sing covers of songs but we do it without any instruments.
translation.zh: 当然 我们不用任何乐器 唱出整首歌曲

translation.en: It's all from our mouths.
translation.zh: 全靠嘴发声

translation.en: Yikes.
translation.zh: 恶啊

translation.en: There's four groups on campus. The Bellas. That's us. We're the tits.
translation.zh: 本校有四个这种社团 贝拉团 我们 最棒的

translation.en: The BU Harmonics.
translation.zh: 还有巴大合音

translation.en: They sing a lot of Madonna.
translation.zh: 专长麦当娜

translation.en: Uh, the High Notes.
translation.zh: 高音

translation.en: They're not particularly motivated.
translation.zh: 他们比较没有上进心

translation.en: And then there's…
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: So, are you interested?
translation.zh: 你有兴趣吗

translation.en: Sorry, it just, it's pretty lame.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我觉得太逊了

translation.en: A-ca-scuse me?
translation.zh: 你说什么

translation.en: Synchronized lady dancing to a Mariah Carey chart topper is not lame.
translation.zh: 给玛利亚凯利的最红单曲 跳伴舞可不逊

translation.en: We sing all over the world and we compete in national championships.
translation.zh: 我们还到全世界的锦标赛 去唱歌比赛

translation.en: On purpose?
translation.zh: 认真的

translation.en: We played the Cobb Energy Performing Arts Centre, you bitch!
translation.zh: 我们可在柯布能源表演艺术中心 表演过的 贱人

translation.en: What Aubrey means to say is that we are a close-knit,
translation.zh: 奥布里的意思是 我们是一群

translation.en: talented group of ladies whose dream is
translation.zh: 细心有才华的女生

translation.en: to return to the national finals at Lincoln Center this year.
translation.zh: 今年梦想着再次去林肯中心 参加国家赛总决赛

translation.en: Help us turn our dreams into a reality?
translation.zh: 想帮我们美梦成真吗

translation.en: Sorry, I don't even sing, but it was really nice to meet you guys.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不唱歌 但见到你们很高兴

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办

translation.en: When you came in and you were just strumming the guitar,
translation.zh: 你进来的时候 居然狂扫吉他

translation.en: and it was, like, totally off-key, I wanted to choke you!
translation.zh: 简直不在调上 我想掐死你

translation.en: -Bumper. -I wanted to choke you out!
translation.zh: -邦普尔 -我想掐死你

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna go introduce myself.
translation.zh: 好了 我要去自我介绍

translation.en: Everybody be cool. It's just a normal day.
translation.zh: 大家都淡定 这不过是平凡的日子

translation.en: Hi. Hi.
translation.zh: 你好 你好

translation.en: Benjamin Applebaum.
translation.zh: 本杰明阿普勒鲍姆

translation.en: I saw you guys perform at a Mall of America like three years ago.
translation.zh: 大概在三年前 我看过你在 美国商城的表演

translation.en: Totally changed my life. I have not stopped thinking about you since.
translation.zh: 彻底改变了我的人生 从那之后我不停地想到你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And, Bumper, huge fan.
translation.zh: 邦普尔 我是你的大粉丝

translation.en: Your arrangement of Lovin' Spoonful's "Do You Believe in Magic"
translation.zh: 受你对爱勺的《你相信魔法吗》 做的改编的启发

translation.en: inspired me to become a certified illusionist.
translation.zh: 我成为了一名合格的魔术师

translation.en: The smell of your weird is actually affecting my vocal cords,
translation.zh: 你诡异的气息 已经影响到了我的声带

translation.en: so I'm gonna need you to scoot. Skedaddle.
translation.zh: 你需要你闪人 速速离开

translation.en: But why don't we just exchange emails,
translation.zh: 我们能不能交换电邮地址

translation.en: and then totally hang out right now, together?
translation.zh: 以后有机会一起聚聚

translation.en: No. Hard pass. Hard pass.
translation.zh: 不 绝对不行 绝对不行

translation.en: What a nerd alert. Okay, guys, now let's match pitch.
translation.zh: 呆子警报 好了 大伙 听唱音阶

translation.en: -Too far. -You think?
translation.zh: -太过分了 -你觉得吗

translation.en: -Yeah. -Should I have done another trick?
translation.zh: 没错 我是不是表演错魔术了

translation.en: No, I think your trick was fine. I just think the talking was a little weird.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得你表演得非常好 就是说话有点别扭

translation.en: Maybe you can try to Facebook message him.
translation.zh: 也许你可以在脸书上私信他

translation.en: Hey, I'm Beca, um--
translation.zh: 你好 我是贝卡

translation.en: I mean, you're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: It's a tough blow, ladies.
translation.zh: 漂亮的一击 姑娘们

translation.en: The word you needed to match was "it." And you sang, "it's."

translation.en: -You are… [claps] -[all] Cut off!

translation.en: -Are you serious? -The Trebles win!

translation.en: -[Treblemakers cheering] -Beca, I'm sorry. You lost.

translation.en: I've never heard that rule! Ladies, ladies, come on. Come back.
translation.zh: 我从来没听过这规矩 姑娘们 姑娘们 我们走

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Money in the bank. Money in the bank.
translation.zh: 探囊取物

translation.en: Enjoy watching us win the ICCAs.
translation.zh: 希望你们喜欢看我们赢得ICCA

translation.en: On the TV. On a regional cable affiliate.
translation.zh: 电视直播 地区有线台

translation.en: Before everybody goes to bed tonight,
translation.zh: 大家睡觉之前

translation.en: I need you to make a list of everything you did wrong.
translation.zh: 把犯的错误下来

translation.en: I'm gonna melt that Cabbage Patch Kid.
translation.zh: 我要煮了那椰菜娃娃

translation.en: Hey, guys, what we just did was great, right?
translation.zh: 大伙 我们刚刚不是很棒吗

translation.en: Calm your pits, Beca. We still lost.

translation.en: Yeah, but it was spontaneous. It was awesome.
translation.zh: 对 但那是即兴的 非常棒啊

translation.en: We were actually listening to…
translation.zh: 我们真的在听…

translation.en: Okay, everybody, hands in.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 伸手

translation.en: "Ah" on my count.
translation.zh: 数到三 啊

translation.en: -On three or after three? -On three.
translation.zh: -是第三 还是三之后 -第三

translation.en: -After three. -One, two, three.
translation.zh: 三之后 一二三

translation.en: That's not how we do it.
translation.zh: 我们不是这么做的

translation.en: Oh! Why can't we figure this out?
translation.zh: 我们怎么就闹不明白了呢

translation.en: [loudly] So, I just find songs that have the same chord progressions
translation.zh: 找了几首和旋一样的歌

translation.en: and create a track that blends them together.
translation.zh: 把他们混在一起 做一个新音轨

translation.en: So, like, this is the new bass line,
translation.zh: 这是新的低音线

translation.en: and this is matching up downbeats.
translation.zh: 而这是配和的强拍

translation.en: [quieter] Oh, I'm talking really loud.
translation.zh: 我说话特别大声啊

translation.en: Um… That's me singing.
translation.zh: 这是我唱的部分

translation.en: [loudly] This is really good.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: [quieter] Now I'm the one yelling, right?
translation.zh: 现在是我在吼 是不是

translation.en: That is amazing, Beca.
translation.zh: 太棒了 贝卡

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So, I brought this over,
translation.zh: 我把这个带来了

translation.en: because I wanna watch you watch the end of this movie.
translation.zh: 我想看你把这部电影结尾看完

translation.en: And then I can die a hero.
translation.zh: 我死而无憾

translation.en: Wait, actually…
translation.zh: 等等 你是不是

translation.en: You have a habit of making yourself at home, did you know that?
translation.zh: 把这当你自己家了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: The Breakfast Club. 1985.
translation.zh: 《早餐俱乐部》1958

translation.en: Greatest ending to any movie ever.
translation.zh: 史上最佳结局

translation.en: This song launched Simple Minds in the US.
translation.zh: 这首歌让《头脑简单》乐团 红遍美国

translation.en: Could have been a Billy Idol song, but he turned it down.
translation.zh: 本来是让毕利爱多尔唱 可他拒绝了

translation.en: Idiot.
translation.zh: 笨蛋

translation.en: Perfectly sums up the movie. It's equally beautiful and sad.
translation.zh: 对电影完美点题 优美哀伤

translation.en: That is fascinating.
translation.zh: 很迷人

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 很迷人 对

translation.en: Tell me, what does Judd Nelson eat for breakfast?
translation.zh: 告诉我 贾德纳尔逊早餐吃什么

translation.en: Oh, well, like all misunderstood rebels, he feeds on hypocrisy.
translation.zh: 像所有被误解的反叛者一样 他以虚伪为食

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: And black coffee to help with his morning dumps.
translation.zh: 还有黑咖啡 让他消消起床气

translation.en: You're an idiot.
translation.zh: 你是个傻蛋

translation.en: It's true. I'm full of fun facts.
translation.zh: 真的 我一肚子有趣事实

translation.en: You should let other people tell you they're fun.
translation.zh: 应该是别人说你有趣吧

translation.en: [Andrew] And an athlete.
translation.zh: 一个运动员

translation.en: [Allison] And a basket case.
translation.zh: 一个废物

translation.en: [Claire] A princess.
translation.zh: 一个公主

translation.en: [Bender] And a criminal.
translation.zh: 一个罪犯

translation.en: [Brian] Does that answer your question?
translation.zh: 这回答了你的问题了吗

translation.en: Sincerely yours, the Breakfast Club.
translation.zh: 你诚挚的 早餐俱乐部

translation.en: You're missing the ending. Sorry.
translation.zh: 你要错过结尾了

translation.en: ♪ …forget about me ♪
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: It's good. I'm sure the beginning is…
translation.zh: 不错 我敢说开头也…

translation.en: The white girl is back.
translation.zh: 白人女回来了

translation.en: And I'm out.
translation.zh: 我走了

translation.en: Always a pleasure, Kimmy Jin.
translation.zh: 见到你很高兴 吉米金

translation.en: So… Excuse me. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借过 借过

translation.en: I should have taken that cardio tip more seriously.
translation.zh: 看来有氧运动得认真做了

translation.en: How much have you done?
translation.zh: 你做了多少了

translation.en: You just saw it.
translation.zh: 你不是刚看到了吗

translation.en: Chloe, you gotta be able to hit that last note.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 最后高音你得唱上去

translation.en: I can't. It's impossible.
translation.zh: 我上不去 不可能

translation.en: And it's because of my, my nodes.
translation.zh: 因为我有 结节

translation.en: Her nodes. Her nodes.
translation.zh: 她的结节 她的结节

translation.en: Well, if you can't do it, then someone else needs to solo.
translation.zh: 如果你唱不上去 就要换人来独唱了

translation.en: I think Beca should take my solo.
translation.zh: 我觉得贝卡可以替我独唱

translation.en: Yeah, Beca would be excellent.
translation.zh: 贝卡肯定会很棒的

translation.en: But also, someone else might be equally as excellent.
translation.zh: 可其他人也会一样棒的

translation.en: -It's true. -And they might be shy
translation.zh: 真的 她们也许是害羞

translation.en: and not wanna come forward and say they wanted a solo.
translation.zh: 真的 她们也许是害羞 不敢上前 说自己想唱独唱

translation.en: Well, Beca doesn't want a solo, so…
translation.zh: 贝卡不想独唱 那么…

translation.en: I would be happy to do it
translation.zh: 贝卡不想独唱 那么… 我很乐意的

translation.en: if I got to pick a new song and do an arrangement.
translation.zh: 如果我可以选首新歌 重新做安排

translation.en: Well, that's not how we run things here.
translation.zh: 我们这里没有这个规矩

translation.en: Aubrey, maybe Beca has a point. Maybe we could try something new.
translation.zh: 奥布里 贝卡说的也有道理 也许我们应该尝试新东西

translation.en: A-ca-scuse me?
translation.zh: 阿卡你说什么贝拉

translation.en: You can sing "Turn the Beat Around" and that's the last I wanna hear of this.
translation.zh: 你能唱《舞力四射》 我只想听这一句话

translation.en: That song is tired. We're not gonna win with it.
translation.zh: 那首歌过时了 唱它是赢不了比赛的

translation.en: If we pull samples from different genres
translation.zh: 如果我们吸取不同类型的样本

translation.en: and layer them together, we could make some…
translation.zh: 然后叠加起来 就可以有新的…

translation.en: Okay, let me explain something to you because you still don't seem to get it.
translation.zh: 我说的话看来你还是不理解 再跟你解释一下

translation.en: Our goal is to get back to the finals and these songs will get us there.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是闯入决赛 这些歌就会带我们去决赛

translation.en: So, excuse me if I don't take advice from some alt-girl with her mad lib beats,
translation.zh: 所以抱歉 我不接受什么 另类女孩的疯狂节拍的建议

translation.en: because she's never even been in competition.
translation.zh: 因为她一场比赛都没参加过

translation.en: Have I made myself clear?
translation.zh: 我说得够清楚了吗

translation.en: Crystal. I won't solo.
translation.zh: 一清二楚 我不独唱

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Fat Amy? -Yes, sir?
translation.zh: -肥艾米 -长官

translation.en: -You'll solo. -[exclaims happily]
translation.zh: 你来独唱

translation.en: Yes! Yes.
translation.zh: 太好了 太好了

translation.en: [John] Welcome, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 欢迎女士们先生们

translation.en: The 2012 southeastern regional competition has officially begun.
translation.zh: 2012东南地区地区赛正式开幕

translation.en: Yes, I'm Gail Abernathy McCadd,
translation.zh: 我是盖尔阿伯内西麦卡德

translation.en: and to my right is fellow a cappella alum John Smith
translation.zh: 我右边坐着的是 前阿卡贝拉成员 约翰史密斯

translation.en: and we are live from Carolina University.
translation.zh: 我们在卡罗莱纳大学现场直播

translation.en: It's a new season for a cappella.
translation.zh: 这是阿卡贝拉的新赛季了

translation.en: The regionals begin the long road to Lincoln Center
translation.zh: 漫长的地区赛通往林肯中心

translation.en: where all of these youngsters hope to one day win a trophy
translation.zh: 那里是所有年轻人期望的奖杯所在

translation.en: by making music with their mouths.
translation.zh: 要靠着自己的一张嘴踏上征途

translation.en: A cappella out of sock puppets? Genius.
translation.zh: 用袜子玩偶唱阿卡贝拉 天才

translation.en: [Beca] Yeah, look at the black one with the white sock.
translation.zh: 没错 看那个戴白袜子的黑人

translation.en: [Cynthia Rose] It's making a statement.
translation.zh: 真是突出

translation.en: There's no craft there. Watching them will make you worse.
translation.zh: 根本粗制滥造 看他们表演 会把你们带跑的

translation.en: At least they're different.
translation.zh: 至少他们与众不同

translation.en: And the Sockappellas, once again proving
translation.zh: 袜卡贝拉又一次证明

translation.en: that it doesn't get better for everyone after high school.
translation.zh: 高中毕业也没有长进的人是有的

translation.en: Do we… do we clap?
translation.zh: 我们鼓掌吗

translation.en: -No, we don't. -Never.
translation.zh: 不 不鼓掌 从不

translation.en: -Hands in. -[emcee] Is it hot in here or what?
translation.zh: 伸手

translation.en: Remember, "ah" on three.
translation.zh: 记住 数到三 啊

translation.en: One, two…
translation.zh: 一二

translation.en: -[all singing asynchronously] -Wait, you said we'd…
translation.zh: 等等 你说我们…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: It's okay, it's gonna be okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 没关系 不会有事的

translation.en: Let's give it up for the Barden Bellas!
translation.zh: 有请巴登贝拉团

translation.en: This does not look like the fresh-faced nubile Bellas that we have come to know.
translation.zh: 这可不是我们熟悉的 面容姣好身材傲人的贝拉人啊

translation.en: Is it me or are those skirts just not working anymore?
translation.zh: 是我自己一个人这么想 还是那些裙子真的很过时

translation.en: You're walking the line, John.
translation.zh: 你真是敢说 约翰

translation.en: It's a nice surprise to see the Bellas mixing it up.
translation.zh: 看到贝拉有新的混搭 很是惊喜

translation.en: It's refreshing, yet displeasing to the eye.
translation.zh: 让人眼前一亮 但刺痛了双眼

translation.en: One, two, three, four.
translation.zh: 一二三四

translation.en: [Gail] The Barden Bellas bringing back
translation.zh: 巴登贝拉带来的

translation.en: the same song they sang at last year's finals.
translation.zh: 正是去年决赛时演唱的曲目

translation.en: And all eyes will be on senior Aubrey Posen.
translation.zh: 所有目光都在大四的 奥布里波兹南身上

translation.en: She could toss some cookies at any moment.
translation.zh: 她可能会随时发饼干

translation.en: [Gail] And she makes it through, folks. No cookie toss.
translation.zh: 她撑住了 大伙 没有发饼干

translation.en: John, a change of pace could not come soon enough here for the Barden Bellas.
translation.zh: 约翰 巴登贝拉团 还是没有什么变革啊

translation.en: This is not a great way to start their season.
translation.zh: 这个赛季的开端不是太好

translation.en: Yeah, this number is like an elephant dart to the public's face.
translation.zh: 没错 这首歌听得 观众耳朵都长茧子了

translation.en: [man] Yeah, Fat Amy.
translation.zh: 太棒了 肥艾米

translation.en: [Gail] The Barden Bellas went deep into the archive for that song, John.
translation.zh: 巴顿贝拉团 对这首歌还真是专情 约翰

translation.en: I remember singing it with my own a cappella group.
translation.zh: 我在我们阿卡贝拉团里的时候 也唱过

translation.en: And what group was that, Gail?
translation.zh: 你那是什么团 盖尔

translation.en: The Minstrel Cycles, John.
translation.zh: 游吟诗人周期 约翰

translation.en: Well, that's an unfortunate name.
translation.zh: 够不幸的名字

translation.en: [emcee] Thank you. Really incredible, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 谢谢 非常精彩

translation.en: The Bellas. Thank you. Wow!
translation.zh: 巴登贝拉团 谢谢

translation.en: [emcee] Yeah. Great, right? Amazing.
translation.zh: 非常棒 太惊艳了

translation.en: You know, there must be something in the water over there at Barden University,
translation.zh: 我跟你说 巴登大学 绝对非同一般

translation.en: 'cause this next group is also from Barden.
translation.zh: 因为下一团选手也来自巴登

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the Barden University Treblemakers.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 有请巴登大学骚乱制造者

translation.en: Ah, here we go, the Barden Treblemakers.
translation.zh: 开始了 巴登骚乱制造者

translation.en: They're on the trail for Lincoln Center, huh?
translation.zh: 他们是林肯中心表演的热门吧

translation.en: [John] Absolutely, they always are, Gail.
translation.zh: 当然 一直如此 盖尔

translation.en: My favorite, and everyone's favorite.
translation.zh: 我的最爱 也是大家的最爱

translation.en: Now it says here in my notes that their front man Bumper Allen
translation.zh: 我的资料里写着 领头的是邦普尔艾伦

translation.en: has recently released his own line of sports sandals.
translation.zh: 刚刚推出了自己的运动凉鞋系列

translation.en: Boy, the bad boys of a cappella have just gotten badder.
translation.zh: 阿卡贝拉的坏小子们更坏了

translation.en: Whoo! That's right, John.
translation.zh: 没错 约翰

translation.en: I'm gonna have to excuse myself to freshen up the downtown.
translation.zh: 我得去市中心美美容了

translation.en: Can I help?
translation.zh: 我能帮忙吗

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the moment we've all been waiting for.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 我们期待已久的时刻到了

translation.en: The results of tonight's regional competition.
translation.zh: 今晚地区赛结果

translation.en: In third place, the Sockappellas!
translation.zh: 第三名 袜卡贝拉

translation.en: -Yeah, lucky you. -[emcee] In second place,
translation.zh: -算你走运 -第二名

translation.en: and advancing to this year's semi-finals,
translation.zh: 并先进入半决赛的 巴登贝拉团

translation.en: -the Barden Bellas. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 并先进入半决赛的 巴登贝拉团 太棒了

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Oh, nice. Nice.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: And the winner of tonight's regional competition,
translation.zh: 今晚地区赛的冠军

translation.en: defending their crown, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 正是卫冕冠军 女士们先生们

translation.en: the Barden University Treblemakers!
translation.zh: 巴登大学骚乱制造者

translation.en: [man] Way to go, Trebles.
translation.zh: 干得好 骚乱者们

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: That's right!
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'm willing to sign breasts. Yes! I'm willing to sign…
translation.zh: 我准备好在胸上签字了 我准备好…

translation.en: Oh, look who it is. Old dudes.
translation.zh: 是谁啊 老家伙们

translation.en: [sing-song] Get a life.
translation.zh: 找点事干吧

translation.en: Sonic boom.
translation.zh: 音爆

translation.en: Just 'cause we graduated a few years ago,
translation.zh: 我们早几年毕业

translation.en: doesn't mean we can't still get off performing our oral magic, all right?
translation.zh: 不代表我们不能 用嘴演奏魔法 懂吗

translation.en: Oral magic?
translation.zh: 口法

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, buddy, buddy.
translation.zh: 小子 小子

translation.en: Are you looking for what I think you're looking for?
translation.zh: 你是在找我找的麻烦嘛

translation.en: [Tonehanger] Yeah, a fight? You looking for a fight?
translation.zh: 想打架吗 你想打架吗 拜托 拜托说你想打架

translation.en: Please, please. Please say you're looking for a fight.
translation.zh: 拜托 拜托说你想打架 拜托 你说你想打架吧

translation.en: Please, please say you're looking for a fight.
translation.zh: 拜托 你说你想打架吧

translation.en: Yes! I will fight.
translation.zh: 对 我想打架

translation.en: I would fight him,
translation.zh: 对 我想打架 我会跟他打的

translation.en: but I tore a quad within the midst of the dance…
translation.zh: 但我跳舞的时候拉伤了肢体

translation.en: Hey, Gandhi. Hey, you, are we doing this or what?
translation.zh: 甘地 你 你要不要打啊

translation.en: -Hit me. -What?
translation.zh: -打我 -什么

translation.en: Let's get it on!
translation.zh: 我们开战

translation.en: I've wrestled crocodiles and dingoes simultaneously.
translation.zh: 我同时跟鳄鱼和野狗打过

translation.en: -Come here! -[Jesse] Why do you want me to hit you?
translation.zh: -快来 -你为什么让我打你

translation.en: I don't wanna do that.
translation.zh: 我不想打你

translation.en: I need to feel something. Hit me as hard as you can.
translation.zh: 我需要找感觉 你尽全力打我

translation.en: Hit me hard. Take this. Take this. I want you to hit me with it.
translation.zh: 使劲打我 字 幕拿着 我希望你拿它打我

translation.en: I'm just gonna… I'm just gonna check on them.
translation.zh: 我去 去看看他们

translation.en: The kraken has been unleashed.
translation.zh: 关门放海怪了

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Feel the Fat Amy force!
translation.zh: 常常肥艾米的厉害吧

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Oh! That's fantastic!
translation.zh: 太爽了

translation.en: -Amy, don't. Amy! -Feel the fat power.
translation.zh: 艾米 不要 艾米 感受肥动力吧

translation.en: Fat Amy! Kick me in the balls!
translation.zh: 肥艾米 踹我蛋蛋

translation.en: -[Beca] Amy! -Ooh.
translation.zh: 艾米

translation.en: Give me the sharp weapon, I wanna put it up his butt!
translation.zh: 把这个利器给我 我要塞他屁股里

translation.en: Ooh! Cherry on top.
translation.zh: 画龙点睛

translation.en: Which way are you running?
translation.zh: 你从哪边跑

translation.en: -This way. -All right.
translation.zh: -这边 -好

translation.en: [man] Beautiful.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮

translation.en: Amy!
translation.zh: 艾米

translation.en: Vertical running.
translation.zh: 垂直跑

translation.en: [Amy] I'm vertical running.
translation.zh: 我垂直跑

translation.en: Hey, Hilary Swank from Million Dollar Baby.
translation.zh: 《百万宝贝》里的希拉里斯万克

translation.en: Hey, you know you just have to say, "Hey, Million Dollar Baby."
translation.zh: 你需要说 好啊 百万宝贝

translation.en: You don't have to reference the specific actress.
translation.zh: 不用解释那么多具体的

translation.en: Damn. Prison changed you.
translation.zh: 糟糕 蹲监狱蹲得人都变了

translation.en: Thanks for bailing me out.
translation.zh: 谢谢你把我保释出来

translation.en: Well, I didn't.
translation.zh: 保释你的不是我

translation.en: You called my dad?
translation.zh: 你打给我爸爸了

translation.en: I know, I know, but they were putting you in handcuffs, Bec.
translation.zh: 我懂 你手铐都戴上了 贝卡

translation.en: It looked pretty serious.
translation.zh: 感觉很严重啊

translation.en: That doesn't mean you call my dad.
translation.zh: 不代表让你打给我爸啊

translation.en: Who else was I gonna call? Okay, why are you yelling at me?
translation.zh: 我还能找谁 你干嘛冲我喊

translation.en: I'm the only one here.
translation.zh: 只有我在这

translation.en: I didn't ask you to be.
translation.zh: 我又没求你

translation.en: I was just trying to help you.
translation.zh: 我只是想帮你

translation.en: I don't need your help, you're not my boyfriend.
translation.zh: 我不需要你帮 你又不是我男友

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 懂了

translation.en: -Dad, it's not a big deal. -Yeah, it's a big deal.
translation.zh: 爸 不是什么大事 这是大事

translation.en: I get a call in the middle of the night
translation.zh: 大半夜打电话告诉我

translation.en: saying my daughter's been arrested for destruction of property.
translation.zh: 我女儿因为破坏财务被逮捕

translation.en: It was a misunderstanding and I was protecting my friends.
translation.zh: 都是误会 我当时想保护我朋友

translation.en: I was putting myself out there. Making memories.
translation.zh: 我是走出去 创造回忆

translation.en: If you think I'm paying for you to go to LA after a stunt like this,
translation.zh: 如果你以为 闹了这么一出 我还会出钱让你去洛杉矶

translation.en: I'm not. Get in the car.
translation.zh: 你就错了 上车

translation.en: You're not even gonna hear what I have to say about this?
translation.zh: 你难道都不听我解释吗

translation.en: No, not tonight. Just get in.
translation.zh: 不 今晚不听 上车吧

translation.en: [Amy] What up, Shawshank?
translation.zh: 你好啊 肖申克出来了

translation.en: Did you get yourself a bitch?
translation.zh: 给自己找个马子了吗

translation.en: Did they spray you with a hose?
translation.zh: 他们用水管喷你了吗

translation.en: [quietly] I did a turn at County.
translation.zh: 我在县监狱被喷过

translation.en: You guys waited up for me?
translation.zh: 你们在等我

translation.en: Of course we waited up for you.
translation.zh: 当然要等你

translation.en: They've been here for hours. It's a real inconvenience, Beca.
translation.zh: 她们在这待好几个小时了 非常不便 贝卡

translation.en: Beca, I'm glad you're here.
translation.zh: 贝卡 很高兴你来了

translation.en: I'm calling an emergency Bella meeting.
translation.zh: 召开贝拉紧急会议

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: -First up… -Yes.
translation.zh: -第一 -好吧

translation.en: Our score sheet revealed that the Sockappellas almost beat us.
translation.zh: 得分表显示 袜卡贝拉差点就赢过我们了

translation.en: And Fat Amy, you need to do it exactly how we rehearsed it, okay?
translation.zh: 肥艾米 你要严格按排练来

translation.en: No surprises.
translation.zh: 不要搞意外

translation.en: We should be taking risks. It's not enough to be good,
translation.zh: 我们应该冒冒险 这样还不够好

translation.en: we need to put ourselves out there, be different.
translation.zh: 我们需要释放自己 做出与众不同的东西

translation.en: Beca's right. The Trebles never sing the same song twice.
translation.zh: 贝卡说的对 骚乱从来不会一首歌唱两遍

translation.en: The audience love the Trebles, they tolerate us.
translation.zh: 观众爱他们 忍受我们

translation.en: We could change the face of a cappella if we…
translation.zh: 我们可以改变阿卡贝拉的外在 如果我们…

translation.en: Oh, my God, that sounded so queerballs. What's happening to me?
translation.zh: 天啊 我的语气好诡异 这是怎么了

translation.en: Let me show you this arrangement I've been working on.
translation.zh: 让你看看我做的编排

translation.en: [Chloe] I didn't know you were into this stuff.
translation.zh: 我不知道你还喜欢这个

translation.en: [Beca] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Okay, I have the pitch pipe, and I say that we focus on the set list as planned.
translation.zh: 行了 我说的算 我说大家按原计划进行

translation.en: From now on, there will be no more wasting time with work
translation.zh: 从现在起 没有时间再浪费在

translation.en: or school or boyfriends or partners.
translation.zh: 工作上学或者男友搭档上了

translation.en: Sorry, Cynthia Rose.
translation.zh: 抱歉 辛西娅露丝

translation.en: But, Aubrey, this stuff is pretty cool. I mean…
translation.zh: 但是奥布里 这个很好听

translation.en: Okay. Rehearsal tomorrow, 8:00 a.m. sharp.
translation.zh: 够了 明早八点整排练

translation.en: This is my track! You're playing my song right now!
translation.zh: 我的音轨 你现在放的是我的歌

translation.en: -That is awesome! -You like it?
translation.zh: 太棒了 你喜欢吗

translation.en: You put it on the radio! That is amazing!
translation.zh: 你放到广播里了 太赞了

translation.en: It's a sick beat.
translation.zh: 节奏太爽了

translation.en: Yeah, I always thought her beats were pretty sick.
translation.zh: 对 我一直认为她节奏不错

translation.en: Hey, Becky, listen, spring break, I want you to take the night shift.
translation.zh: 贝卡 听着 春假的时候 我希望你来值夜班

translation.en: Play your music.
translation.zh: 放你的音乐

translation.en: The DJ at the Garage does a brilliant version of this, but yours? It's better.
translation.zh: 车库DJ的确实不错 但你的 更好

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 没有错

translation.en: I'm gonna listen to her tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚听她的

translation.en: I think you should… You should come with.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该过来

translation.en: I have a thing.
translation.zh: 我有事

translation.en: Flight attendant training?
translation.zh: 空姐训练吗

translation.en: It's, uh, Barden Bellas. I have the semi-finals tonight.
translation.zh: 是巴登贝拉团 今晚半决赛

translation.en: Really? I did not have you pegged as an a cappella girl.
translation.zh: 真的吗 没想过你居然是阿卡贝拉姑娘

translation.en: That's 'cause you don't know Becky like I do.
translation.zh: 所以你不如我了解贝卡

translation.en: See you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚见

translation.en: Okay, don't you flat-butts worry, I got this.
translation.zh: 你们这群平屁股别担心 我来

translation.en: I'm just gonna pump and dump.
translation.zh: 我去去就来

translation.en: [Bumper] I don't care what you say.
translation.zh: 不管你说什么

translation.en: Sisqó live, best performance ever, I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 西斯科现场 是我听过最好的现场演出

translation.en: -"Thong Song" isn't his only hit. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 他的热单不只《人字拖歌》一首

translation.en: All right? That's serious.
translation.zh: 好吗 真的

translation.en: Yo, Bump, is that Fat Amy?
translation.zh: 邦普尔 那是肥艾米吗

translation.en: Donald, slow down! Slow down!
translation.zh: 唐纳德 慢点 慢点

translation.en: Yeah! All right!
translation.zh: 好 太棒了

translation.en: Hey, Amy? Sabotage!
translation.zh: 艾米 破坏

translation.en: I've been shot.
translation.zh: 我中弹了

translation.en: I've just been shot! Help me.
translation.zh: 我中弹了 救命

translation.en: Fat Amy! Ah!
translation.zh: 肥艾米

translation.en: They shot the harpy!
translation.zh: 他们击中了肥艾米

translation.en: I've got you. I've got you.
translation.zh: 我扶住你了 扶住你了

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm talking, I'm talking… I'm sitting up.
translation.zh: 别 别 别 我说话呢 我坐起来了

translation.en: -All right. Cool. -[Amy] There's no need for that.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题 没有必要这样

translation.en: No mouth to mouth.
translation.zh: 没必要嘴对嘴

translation.en: Oh, shit. Bumper threw a big-ass burrito at me.
translation.zh: 该死 邦普尔朝我扔了个 该死的巨型玉米煎饼

translation.en: I'm gonna kill him, I swear. I'm gonna finish him like a cheesecake.
translation.zh: 我发誓我要宰了他 像奶酪蛋糕一样把他吃干抹净

translation.en: You've got yourself a little something there.
translation.zh: 你这里有点东西

translation.en: Just leave it. It fuels my hate fire.
translation.zh: 留着 点燃我的怒火

translation.en: ♪ And the Jay-Z song was on ♪ ♪ Oh, my God ♪
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -It's a… It's… -[engine sputtering]
translation.zh: 这

translation.en: -What the hell? -[Amy] Um…
translation.zh: 怎么了

translation.en: It's pretty cool, actually. I think we're just running out of gas.
translation.zh: 太好了 真的 好像没汽油了

translation.en: No, that can't be. You just filled the tank.
translation.zh: 不 不可能啊 你不是刚加完油吗

translation.en: Yeah, I did.
translation.zh: 对 刚加完

translation.en: And… yet, maybe I didn't, because I got hit by flying Mexican food.
translation.zh: 也可能没加 因为我被飞行的墨西哥食物击中了

translation.en: Mmm. We're out.
translation.zh: 没油了

translation.en: A-ca-scuse me?
translation.zh: 阿卡你说什么

translation.en: A-ca-believe it.
translation.zh: 阿卡不敢相信

translation.en: [Amy] Man, what are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 天啊 我们该怎么办

translation.en: Maybe we could call…
translation.zh: 或许可以打给…

translation.en: No, don't even say it, Chloe. How dare you?
translation.zh: 不行 提都别提 克洛伊 你好大胆子

translation.en: Oh, no, actually that is a really good idea. I've got Bumper's number.
translation.zh: 不 其实这个主意还不错 我有邦普尔的电话

translation.en: Why do you have Bumper's number?
translation.zh: 你怎么会有邦普尔的电话

translation.en: So, Bellas,
translation.zh: 贝拉姑娘们

translation.en: what boring, estrogen-filled set have you prepared for us this evening?
translation.zh: 多无聊啊 充满雌激素的各位 准备好今晚被我们击败了吗

translation.en: -[Amy] Uh, excuse me? -[Bumper] Mmm-hmm?
translation.zh: 你说什么

translation.en: But you guys are gonna get pitch-slapped so hard
translation.zh: 可你们肯定会被击败

translation.en: your man boobs are gonna concave.
translation.zh: 击到你们的胸都凹下去

translation.en: 9 miles, guys.
translation.zh: 还有九公里 同志们

translation.en: That's pretty good.
translation.zh: 不错啊

translation.en: I set fires to feel joy.
translation.zh: 放火会让我觉得开心

translation.en: That's adorable.
translation.zh: 真可爱

translation.en: Five minutes, Bellas.
translation.zh: 还有五分钟上场 贝拉

translation.en: -Where did he come from? -Shh!
translation.zh: 他是从哪儿来的啊

translation.en: It's over. There's no way we can beat the Footnotes and the Trebles.
translation.zh: 完了 我们根本不可能 打败注脚和骚乱

translation.en: Whoo! That little peanut can sing.
translation.zh: 这个小花生好会唱

translation.en: He really can. It sounds to me, though, Gail, like his boys haven't dropped yet,
translation.zh: 我听着感觉很好 但是盖尔 他的弟弟还没长大啊

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思吧

translation.en: If you mean his testicles, then I do, John. I do. I really do.
translation.zh: 如果你说的是他的蛋蛋 我懂 我非常懂

translation.en: [Aubrey] A-ca-huddle, now.
translation.zh: 阿卡会议 马上

translation.en: The top two teams go to the finals, so we just have to beat one of them.
translation.zh: 只有前两名才能进决赛 我们必须打败他们其中一个

translation.en: And if we do it exactly how we rehearsed it, we will get there, okay? Exactly.
translation.zh: 只要我们彻底按排练的来 就会成功的 完完全全一样

translation.en: Hands in.
translation.zh: 伸手

translation.en: [Stacie] On three or after three?
translation.zh: 第三还是三之后

translation.en: Screw it. Let's just do it.
translation.zh: 不管了 上吧

translation.en: Put your hands together for the Barden Bellas!
translation.zh: 掌声有请 巴登贝拉团

translation.en: [John] Okay, the Bellas are coming out.
translation.zh: 贝拉团走出来了

translation.en: Another step in this competition and…
translation.zh: 大赛中的第二站然而…

translation.en: One, two, three, four…
translation.zh: 一二三四

translation.en: [John] Here we go again.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: [Gail] Looks like they're sticking with what they know.
translation.zh: 看起来他们只能局限在这里了

translation.en: [John] Oh. A little tension on the stage tonight.
translation.zh: 她们今晚在有点紧张啊

translation.en: [Gail mimics cat growl] Claws are out.
translation.zh: 要亮爪了

translation.en: This is just friendly collegiate fun.
translation.zh: 这只是友好的大学娱乐

translation.en: It's a tough competition, but we're all here to have a good time.
translation.zh: 虽然比赛严酷 但我们只需要享受欢乐就好

translation.en: That's right, John. But a mistake can haunt you for the rest of your life
translation.zh: 没错 约翰 但一个错误就能影响你一声

translation.en: and affect your children.
translation.zh: 还会影响你孩子

translation.en: What the hell, Beca? Were you trying to screw us up?
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事 贝卡 你是想搞砸我们吗

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你说真的吗

translation.en: Newsflash. This isn't the Beca show.
translation.zh: 插播新闻 这不是贝卡的演出

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry that I messed you up,
translation.zh: 抱歉 我搞砸了

translation.en: but in case you hadn't noticed, everybody pretty much dozed off during our set.
translation.zh: 但希望你注意到 我们演出的时候 大家都在打瞌睡

translation.en: It's not your job to decide what we do and when we do it.
translation.zh: 不用你来决定我们该唱什么 什么时候该唱

translation.en: Why don't you ask the rest of the group
translation.zh: 怎么不问问其他组员

translation.en: how they felt about your little improvisation?
translation.zh: 对你的即兴表演有什么感想

translation.en: Amy?
translation.zh: 艾米

translation.en: It was cool. But it did take us a little bit by surprise.
translation.zh: 不错 但肯定是有点出乎意料

translation.en: Yeah, a lot by surprise.
translation.zh: 对 非常的出乎意料

translation.en: A little.
translation.zh: 有一点

translation.en: -I told you she wasn't a Bella. -Aubrey, don't.
translation.zh: 我就说她不是贝拉人 奥布里 别这样

translation.en: No, that's okay. You don't have to pretend
translation.zh: 没关系 你不用假装你在这里

translation.en: you're allowed to have a say in the group, right?
translation.zh: 还有什么决定权 好吗

translation.en: Your attitude sucks. You're a grade-A pain in my ass,
translation.zh: 你的态度差 简直是我的头号麻烦

translation.en: and I know you're hooking up with Jesse.
translation.zh: 而且我知道你跟杰西搞在一起

translation.en: Whoa. Whoa. Aubrey, calm down. We're not hooking up, I swear.
translation.zh: 奥布里 冷静 我们没有搞在一起 我发誓

translation.en: Jesus Christ! That's perfect. Of course you're here right now.
translation.zh: 天啊 太好了 你不在这就怪了

translation.en: I don't need your help, okay? Can you back off?
translation.zh: 我不需要你帮我 行吗 你能不能躲远点

translation.en: [Benji] Trebles. Time to bring the pain.
translation.zh: 骚乱者们 该上场了

translation.en: If this is what I get for trying…
translation.zh: 我努力的结果就是这样…

translation.en: [Benji] Beca? Beca, wait.
translation.zh: 贝卡 等等

translation.en: Aubrey, it actually went really well.
translation.zh: 奥布里 其实效果很不错

translation.en: Chloe, stop!
translation.zh: 克洛伊 闭嘴

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Oh, my God. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没事

translation.en: Beca? Beca, wait.
translation.zh: 贝卡 等等

translation.en: [John] And the Treblemakers seal the deal tonight.
translation.zh: 骚乱制造者们今晚一锤定音

translation.en: [Gail] Unfortunately, Barden's other group, the Bellas, do not advance,
translation.zh: 不幸地是巴登的另一个团 贝拉团 不幸出局

translation.en: and senior Aubrey Posen loses her chance
translation.zh: 大四的奥布里波兹南

translation.en: to redeem herself from last year's Pukegate.
translation.zh: 失去了为去年呕吐门雪耻的机会

translation.en: [Kimmy] Happy spring break.
translation.zh: 春假快乐

translation.en: ♪ It is all in your mind ♪
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: ♪ Like a kite ♪
translation.zh: 《早餐俱乐部》

translation.en: [Andrew] And an athlete.
translation.zh: 一个运动员

translation.en: [Allison] And a basket case.
translation.zh: 一个废物

translation.en: [Claire] A princess.
translation.zh: 一个公主

translation.en: -[Bender] And a criminal. -[sobbing]
translation.zh: 一个罪犯

translation.en: [Brian] Does that answer your question?
translation.zh: 这回答了你的问题了吗

translation.en: Sincerely yours, the Breakfast Club.
translation.zh: 你诚挚的 早餐俱乐部

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: We are from the Collegiate A Cappella Association.
translation.zh: 我们是大学阿卡贝拉协会的

translation.en: It has come to our attention that you are not in college.
translation.zh: 我们注意到 你并不是大学生

translation.en: Is this your mother? [clears throat]
translation.zh: 这位是你母亲吗

translation.en: This is Aubrey Posen.
translation.zh: 奥布里波兹南

translation.en: Yes, thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢 先生

translation.en: I look forward to seeing you again at Lincoln Center.
translation.zh: 我期待在林肯中心见到您

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Aubrey?
translation.zh: 奥布里

translation.en: I'm all in, bitches.
translation.zh: 全下 娘们们

translation.en: Okay. The a-ca-gods have looked down on us and they have given us a second chance.
translation.zh: 好 受阿卡贝拉神眷顾 给了我们第二次机会

translation.en: Shalom!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I texted Beca.
translation.zh: 我给贝卡发信息了

translation.en: You did what?
translation.zh: 你干嘛了

translation.en: She makes us better.
translation.zh: 她让我们进步了

translation.en: That's not an opinion for you to have, Chloe.
translation.zh: 这事轮不到你来说 克洛伊

translation.en: Why? Because it's not yours?
translation.zh: 为什么 因为不是你说的

translation.en: You're not always right, you know.
translation.zh: 你不可能永远正确

translation.en: We will win without her.
translation.zh: 没有她我们才会赢

translation.en: Jesse, I know you're in there. I can smell popcorn.
translation.zh: 杰西 我知道你在里面 我闻到爆米花味了

translation.en: Jesse, come on. Open up.
translation.zh: 杰西 快开门吧

translation.en: Hey. I tried to call you. I left you a bunch of messages.
translation.zh: 我打你电话 发了一堆短息 都没回应

translation.en: Yeah, I got them.
translation.zh: 对 我都收到了

translation.en: I'm sorry that we fought.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我们吵架了

translation.en: I was mad and I overreacted and I'm just…
translation.zh: 我当时太疯狂了 反应过度

translation.en: Aubrey makes me crazy.
translation.zh: 只是奥布里把我逼疯了

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 你说真的吗

translation.en: You think I'm mad because you yelled at me?
translation.zh: 你觉得我是因为你对我喊而生气吗

translation.en: No, I know…
translation.zh: 不是 我知道

translation.en: No, you don't. You think you know, but you don't.
translation.zh: 不 你不知道 你觉得你知道 可你不知道

translation.en: You push away anyone who could possibly care about you. Why is that?
translation.zh: 你把任何可能关心的人 都推走了 为什么呢

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Well, you better figure it out because I'm done with…
translation.zh: 你自己想清楚吧 因为我受够了

translation.en: Whatever this is.
translation.zh: 随便你这什么

translation.en: -Jesse… -I'm done.
translation.zh: -杰西 -我受够了

translation.en: Women.
translation.zh: 女人

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Okay, stop.
translation.zh: 好了 停

translation.en: What is happening to us?
translation.zh: 我们这是怎么了

translation.en: Chloe, you sound like you smoke three packs a day.
translation.zh: 克洛伊你的嗓子像刚抽完两包烟

translation.en: Stacie, you are so behind on choreography.
translation.zh: 斯黛茜 你动作踩不到点上

translation.en: And Jessica and Ashley, it is like you haven't been here all year long.
translation.zh: 杰西卡和艾世丽 感觉你这一年都没来

translation.en: Aubrey, really?
translation.zh: 奥布里 真的吗

translation.en: We've literally been here the whole time.
translation.zh: 我们真的一直都在

translation.en: Aubrey, please, just give us a break.
translation.zh: 奥布里 拜托 让我们休息一下吧

translation.en: It's kind of not the same without everyone here.
translation.zh: 感觉人不全 就不一样了

translation.en: We need Beca.
translation.zh: 我们需要贝卡

translation.en: Maybe if Aubrey loosened the reins a little bit.
translation.zh: 也许奥布里别逼那么紧…

translation.en: Okay, shut it, Chloe!
translation.zh: 够了 闭嘴 克洛伊

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. That was rude.
translation.zh: 抱歉 刚刚好无礼啊

translation.en: Chloe, could you please get your head out of your ass? It's not a hat.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 把你的脑袋 从屁股里掏出来吧 那又不是帽子

translation.en: A-ca-awkward.
translation.zh: 阿卡尴尬

translation.en: Again.
translation.zh: 再来

translation.en: No one was more surprised than me, but I really liked those girls.
translation.zh: 我是最不敢相信的 我居然很喜欢那些姑娘

translation.en: And you thought quitting was the answer?
translation.zh: 你认为放弃就是你的答案吗

translation.en: Seriously? You can say that to me?
translation.zh: 你认真的吗 你可以跟我说这话吗

translation.en: Oh, come on, Bec, that's so unfair.
translation.zh: 行了吧 贝卡 太不公平了

translation.en: Look, your mom and I, we didn't work.
translation.zh: 听着 我和你妈妈合不来

translation.en: But I tried so hard to make things right between us.
translation.zh: 但我曾想尽办法 解决我们之间的问题

translation.en: But you, you just shut me out.
translation.zh: 但你直接拒绝了我

translation.en: Yeah, well, I shut everybody out. Don't take it personally.
translation.zh: 对 我拒绝了所有人 别以为针对你一个人的

translation.en: It's just easier.
translation.zh: 只是更简单而已

translation.en: It's also really lonely.
translation.zh: 也非常孤单

translation.en: What do I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做

translation.en: Well, that's up to you.
translation.zh: 得你自己决定

translation.en: Trebles, listen up!
translation.zh: 骚乱 听好了

translation.en: Uh, if this is about the Bellas getting into the finals, we already know.
translation.zh: 如果是贝拉团进决赛了 我们已经知道了

translation.en: I don't give a crap about those dumb bitches.
translation.zh: 我根本不关心那些蠢女人

translation.en: Because I'm being brought up to the musical big leagues.
translation.zh: 因为有人带我去创造音乐事业了

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你是什么意思 约翰梅尔亲自让助理来邀请我

translation.en: John Mayer just asked me, personally, through an assistant,
translation.zh: 约翰梅尔亲自让助理来邀请我

translation.en: to sing backup on his [in sing-song] new CD.
translation.zh: 为他的新歌唱和声

translation.en: I leave for Los Angeles in a few hours, so I gotta get going.
translation.zh: 几个小时内我就要去洛杉矶 所以得马上走了

translation.en: But Bumper, what about the ICCAs? They're this weekend.
translation.zh: 可是邦普尔 ICCA怎么办 周末就要比了

translation.en: Hmm. Sorry, buddies, but I won that shit like 100 times, so I'm out of here.
translation.zh: 抱歉各位 可我赢了 大概一百次了吧 我走了

translation.en: Got a collarless leather jacket to buy. Maybe some aviators.
translation.zh: 还得去买无领皮夹克呢 或者飞行员夹克

translation.en: I might get an earring, I don't know.
translation.zh: 兴许还会买个耳环呢 不知道

translation.en: It's Los Angeles. This is exciting stuff. My life rules!
translation.zh: 那可是洛杉矶 让人兴奋 我的生活太棒了

translation.en: -Bumper's a jerk. All right, I said it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 邦普尔是个混蛋 我说出来了

translation.en: -He's a jerk that we need to replace. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 对 他是个混蛋 -我们找人代替他 -对

translation.en: [Donald] Pronto dente.
translation.zh: 得尽快

translation.en: You know he writes his own fan mail.
translation.zh: 你知道粉丝信是他自己写的吗

translation.en: Spot opened up, and it's yours if you want it.
translation.zh: 机会来了 你想来 就是你的

translation.en: Just one condition. Promise me you won't get all weird.
translation.zh: 只有一个条件 跟我保证 你不会表现诡异

translation.en: We're just a group of guys singing a bunch of covers of songs, okay?
translation.zh: 我们只是一群 唱着歌的男人而已 好吗

translation.en: If you get weird, they will definitely not let you stay.
translation.zh: 一旦你开始犯怪 他们肯定会把你赶走

translation.en: Deal. Although I don't know what you mean by weird.
translation.zh: 成交 但是我不理解你说的 我怎么怪了

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 懂了

translation.en: I have been there for you for so many years, and all you do is treat me like…
translation.zh: 我帮了你那么多年 而你一直对我…

translation.en: All right, no, okay, just shut up! Everyone!
translation.zh: 够了 别说了 闭嘴 你们

translation.en: Come on, I joined this group
translation.zh: 拜托 我加入这个社团

translation.en: so I could hang out with a bunch of really cool chicks.
translation.zh: 就是为了跟酷姑娘们一起玩

translation.en: And also 'cause I was really sick of all my boyfriends
translation.zh: 也是因为我受够了那些男朋友

translation.en: and I need to get away from that.
translation.zh: 需要远离他们一段时间

translation.en: But this is some serious horseshit.
translation.zh: 但这简直跟驴粪蛋一样糟

translation.en: What's that smell? Stinks everywhere.
translation.zh: 这么味 这么臭

translation.en: I don't wanna be like the old Bellas.
translation.zh: 我不想当老贝拉人

translation.en: Yeah, I wanna be how we are now.
translation.zh: 对 我想做我们自己

translation.en: [quietly] Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: We should have listened to Beca.
translation.zh: 我们应该听贝卡的

translation.en: -Oh, so it's my fault? -That's not what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 所以怪我咯 我没有这么说

translation.en: No, no, no, that's what you're all thinking, isn't it?
translation.zh: 不 不 你是这么想的吧

translation.en: That I'm the jerk. I am the girl obsessed with winning.
translation.zh: 我是恶人 我是好胜心强的人

translation.en: Aubrey, you're too controlling and it's gonna ruin all of us.
translation.zh: 奥布里 你控制欲太强了 这会毁掉我们的

translation.en: You know what, I can lose control if I want to.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我想的话 也可以失控啊

translation.en: I can let go. This time I'm not gonna choke it down.
translation.zh: 我可以释放 这次我不会被卡住了

translation.en: Come on, bring it! You can do better than that!
translation.zh: 来啊 放马过来 你可以更强的

translation.en: Enough! Enough!
translation.zh: 够了 够了

translation.en: We could have been champions!
translation.zh: 我们本可以夺冠的

translation.en: Give me the pitch pipe, you bitch!
translation.zh: 把调音器给我 贱人

translation.en: Give it to me!
translation.zh: 给我

translation.en: Give it to me! Give it to me!
translation.zh: 给我 给我

translation.en: Never!
translation.zh: 绝不

translation.en: I'll protect you. I'll protect you.
translation.zh: 我会保护你的 我来保护你

translation.en: Hands off the goodies!
translation.zh: 把手从我的奶上拿走

translation.en: Move, you bitches!
translation.zh: 让开 贱人们

translation.en: Guys!
translation.zh: 大家

translation.en: Guys, stop! What is going on?
translation.zh: 住手 这是怎么了

translation.en: Nothing. Nothing. This is a Bellas rehearsal.
translation.zh: 没事 没事 不过是贝拉团排练

translation.en: I know. I just
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是…

translation.en: wanted to say that I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 想来说对不起

translation.en: What I did was a really dick move
translation.zh: 为我之前那个混账行为

translation.en: and I shouldn't have changed the set without asking you guys.
translation.zh: 我不应该说都不说 就擅自改动的

translation.en: And I definitely shouldn't have left.
translation.zh: 也绝对不应该轻易离开

translation.en: I let you guys down and I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 让你们失望了 对不起

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 还有

translation.en: Aubrey, if you would have me, I want back in.
translation.zh: 奥布里 如果你同意 我想回来

translation.en: [whispering] Aubrey.
translation.zh: 奥布里

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Thank you. That would have been embarrassing.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 不然太尴尬了

translation.en: Beca, I know that I've been hard on you, okay?
translation.zh: 贝卡 我知道我对你一直很苛刻

translation.en: I know that I have been hard on everyone here.
translation.zh: 对这所有人也都很苛刻

translation.en: But I am my father's daughter.
translation.zh: 但有其父必有其女

translation.en: [voice breaking] And he always said, "If at first you don't succeed,
translation.zh: 他一直说 如果你不能开始就成功

translation.en: pack your bags."
translation.zh: 就打包走人吧

translation.en: -Jesus. -That's really crazy.
translation.zh: 天啊 太疯狂了

translation.en: I get it. Mine gets on me, too.
translation.zh: 我懂 我爸让我也很烦

translation.en: Not like that, but…
translation.zh: 虽然不是一种烦…

translation.en: I guess we don't really know that much about each other.
translation.zh: 大概我们彼此都不是很了解吧

translation.en: About most of you, really.
translation.zh: 大部分人 真的

translation.en: Well, I'll confess something that none of you know about me.
translation.zh: 我要坦白我的一些 你们都不知道的事

translation.en: I have a lot of sex.
translation.zh: 我性生活非常丰富

translation.en: Yeah, we know, Stacie.
translation.zh: 我们都知道了 斯黛茜

translation.en: Only 'cause I just told you.
translation.zh: 那是因为我告诉你了

translation.en: This is a good idea.
translation.zh: 这是个好主意

translation.en: That was a pretty bad example, but this is a good idea.
translation.zh: 例子没举好 但主意很不错

translation.en: Why don't we all go around the room,
translation.zh: 我们何不在屋里坐成一圈

translation.en: and we can all say something about ourselves that nobody else knows.
translation.zh: 然后说一些 我们彼此不了解的事

translation.en: Okay, I got something.
translation.zh: 好 我有话要说

translation.en: This is hard for me to admit to you guys.
translation.zh: 跟你们很难开口说

translation.en: I think we all know where this is going. Les be honest.
translation.zh: 大家都知道她要什么 我们坦诚相待吧

translation.en: Well, for the last two years, I've had a serious
translation.zh: 已经两年了 我有很严重的

translation.en: gambling problem.
translation.zh: 赌博恶习

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么 -什么

translation.en: It started when I broke up with my girlfriend.
translation.zh: 始于女友跟我分手以后

translation.en: ♪ Whoomp! There it is ♪
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: [mouthing] I still love you.
translation.zh: 我还爱你

translation.en: [Beca] Anyone else?
translation.zh: 还有谁吗

translation.en: [quietly] I ate my twin in the womb.
translation.zh: 我在子宫里吃掉了我的双胞胎

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Fat Amy?
translation.zh: 肥艾米

translation.en: I'm an open book.
translation.zh: 我毫无隐瞒啊

translation.en: I mean, for God's sake, you guys all call me Fat Amy.
translation.zh: 天啊 你们都叫我肥艾米了

translation.en: See, I guess I'm just not really living if I'm not being 100% honest.
translation.zh: 我大概是 不百分百坦诚 就活不了的人吧

translation.en: And my real name is Fat Patricia.
translation.zh: 我的真名叫肥派翠莎

translation.en: [woman] What?
translation.zh: 什么

translation.en: Okay. I've never been one of those girls
translation.zh: 好的 我这个人一直都没交过

translation.en: who had a lot of friends who were girls. And I do now.
translation.zh: 很多女性朋友 但我现在有了

translation.en: And that's pretty cool.
translation.zh: 还都非常好

translation.en: So, that's me. Someone else please go.
translation.zh: 这就是我了 再来一个人继续

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Over spring break, I made the courageous decision to remove my nodes.
translation.zh: 在春假期间 我勇敢地决定 切出了结节

translation.en: I know. The doctor said that I can't sing above a G-sharp,
translation.zh: 我知道 医生说 我唱不到升G了

translation.en: maybe ever.
translation.zh: 也许永远的

translation.en: [sobbing] I thought the season was over.
translation.zh: 我当时以为这个赛季已经结束了

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系 没关系

translation.en: Beca, what do we do?
translation.zh: 贝卡 我们该怎么做

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Maybe not here.
translation.zh: 还是别在这了

translation.en: All right. Let's remix this business.
translation.zh: 好了 我们混音开始了

translation.en: Um, Aubrey, would you pick a song for us, please?
translation.zh: 奥布里 给我们选首歌吧

translation.en: Bruno Mars, "Just the Way You Are".
translation.zh: 布鲁斯马尔斯的《你的样子》

translation.en: Okay. Chloe, are you okay to take the lead?
translation.zh: 好 克洛伊 你来领唱吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hands in.
translation.zh: 伸手

translation.en: [all] One, two…
translation.zh: 一二

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 那是什么声音

translation.en: I don't know, I've never made that sound before.
translation.zh: 不知道 我从来没出过这个动静

translation.en: Yo, but with your messed up vocal cords, you could hit the bass notes.
translation.zh: 以你这被搞砸的声带 可以唱低音了啊

translation.en: Do you know what that means?
translation.zh: 知道这意味着什么吗

translation.en: Yes, Lilly?
translation.zh: 怎么了 百合

translation.en: I think I have something that can help us out.
translation.zh: 我想到怎么帮大家了

translation.en: Excuse me, bitch, you don't need to shout.
translation.zh: 等下 贱人 没必要跟我们喊吧

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[woman] Okay, don't get mouthy.
translation.zh: 好了 别那么多话

translation.en: [John] Welcome to the finals
translation.zh: 欢迎来到2012

translation.en: of the 2012 International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
translation.zh: 国际阿卡贝拉锦标赛总决赛

translation.en: Lincoln Center is proud to welcome back all of these young hopefuls tonight
translation.zh: 林肯中心骄傲地迎来了 这些充满希望的年轻人

translation.en: who are hoping to win a trophy by making music with their mouths.
translation.zh: 用自己的声音赢得奖杯

translation.en: [John] This is gonna be a big night, and I tell you, Gail,
translation.zh: 今晚非常重要 我跟你说 盖尔

translation.en: -if you can just shut your eyes. -[Gail] I'm doing it.
translation.zh: 如果你能闭上眼睛 我闭上了

translation.en: Shut your eyes and get rid of all the a-ca-politics,
translation.zh: 闭上眼睛 摒弃一切阿卡争斗

translation.en: then you can remember that being at Lincoln Center, in the Big Apple,
translation.zh: 只要记住 站上大纽约的林肯中心

translation.en: and singing on this storied stage is the dream of every a cappella singer.
translation.zh: 这承载了无数故事的舞台 就是每个阿卡贝拉歌者的梦想

translation.en: [Gail] You said it, John.
translation.zh: 说的好 约翰

translation.en: [emcee] The University of Virginia Hullabahoos, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 感谢弗吉尼亚大学呼啦草裙乐队

translation.en: There they are.
translation.zh: 先生们 女士们 鼓掌

translation.en: [Treblemakers] One, two, three, swag!
translation.zh: 一二三 摇摆

translation.en: [emcee] Welcome back to the International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella.
translation.zh: 欢迎回到 国际大学生阿卡贝拉锦标赛

translation.en: This next group, they need no introduction, but I'll do it anyway!
translation.zh: 下一组 不用介绍 但我还是要说

translation.en: Uh, good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Thanks. You, too.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你也是

translation.en: [emcee] …the Treblemakers!
translation.zh: 巴登大学 骚乱制造者

translation.en: [Gail] Oh, the Trebles closing it strong like always.
translation.zh: 骚乱们一如既往地强势

translation.en: [John] Absolutely tight. It's gonna be very hard to beat that tonight.
translation.zh: 完全正确 今晚的头号劲敌啊

translation.en: [Gail] Every other group has their work cut out for them, John.
translation.zh: 其他组合也是煞费苦心 想要赢过他们啊 约翰

translation.en: [John] I'm glad it's not us anymore, Gail. Those days are over, thank goodness.
translation.zh: 幸好比赛的不是我们 盖尔 谢天谢地 那种日子过去了

translation.en: [Gail] Especially since they wouldn't have us back.
translation.zh: 尤其是他们不肯让我们加入以后

translation.en: All right. How about that?
translation.zh: 好 大家喜欢吗

translation.en: The Barden University Treblemakers.
translation.zh: 巴登大学 骚乱制造者

translation.en: I love you, awesome nerds.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 优秀的怪胎们

translation.en: Yeah, you guys are the best.
translation.zh: 是啊 你们是最棒的

translation.en: Even though some of you are pretty thin, I think that you all have fat hearts,
translation.zh: 虽然你们有几个太瘦了 但你们绝对有宽大的心

translation.en: -and that's what matters. -[woman] Aw.
translation.zh: 那才是最重要的

translation.en: Okay, let's just smash this. Okay?
translation.zh: 好了 我们去惊艳全场吧

translation.en: [emcee] Ladies and gentlemen, the Barden Bellas!
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 巴登贝拉团

translation.en: [John] Oh, my goodness gracious. Will you look at this?
translation.zh: 我的老天爷啊 瞧瞧

translation.en: Gone are those Bella uniforms and this is a whole new look for them,
translation.zh: 那些贝拉团员 居然全部换新装了

translation.en: and it is hot, hot, hot.
translation.zh: 真是辣辣辣啊

translation.en: [Gail] John, these girls could turn me.
translation.zh: 约翰 这些姑娘简直掰弯我了

translation.en: [woman in audience] We love you, Bellas!
translation.zh: 爱你们 贝拉

translation.en: One, two, three, four.
translation.zh: 一二三四

translation.en: Way to go, Beca!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 贝卡

translation.en: [John] What a show!
translation.zh: 表演得太精彩了

translation.en: I think we have just seen some a cappella history being made, John.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚见证了 阿卡贝拉的一段新历史 约翰

translation.en: And from an all-female group, Gail. I could never have called this one.
translation.zh: 还是全女声团创造的 盖尔 我真是万万没想到

translation.en: Never. Well, you are a misogynist at heart,
translation.zh: 当然了 你一直重男轻女

translation.en: so there's no way you would have bet on these girls to win.
translation.zh: 肯定想不到女生们会赢啊

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: [emcee] Weren't they incredible? Wow!
translation.zh: 她们是不是太棒了

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, let's give it up again for the Barden Bellas!
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 再次感谢巴登贝拉团

translation.en: Told you. Endings are the best part.
translation.zh: 我就说吧 结局是精华

translation.en: You're such a weirdo.
translation.zh: 你真是个怪胎

translation.en: Listen up, a-ca-ballers.
translation.zh: 听好 阿卡面条机们

translation.en: I have been rejected by the Army, shoved into a Dora the Explorer backpack,
translation.zh: 我被军队拒绝了 被塞进了《爱冒险的朵拉》背包里

translation.en: and pushed into the girls' locker room wearing nothing but suspenders.
translation.zh: 然后推到了女生更衣室 全身只穿了吊袜带

translation.en: But no matter. I am in the world that I love.
translation.zh: 但没关系 我生活在我热爱的世界里

translation.en: And with the assistance of my boy, Justin…
translation.zh: 在我的伙伴贾斯丁的协助下

translation.en: My liege.
translation.zh: 陛下

translation.en: I launch this year's auditions.
translation.zh: 我宣布今年的试音

translation.en: -Belly roll. -[drumming]
translation.zh: 肚皮鼓响起

translation.en: The most recent ICCA national champion winners get to pick the audition song.
translation.zh: 由新进ICCA 国家冠军们选曲

translation.en: All right, nerds. Let's go with…
translation.zh: 好了 书呆子们 我们就唱…

translation.en: [Chloe] Because I have nodes.
translation.zh: 因为我长了结节

translation.en: Oh, Chloe, don't worry, it's just God punishing you 'cause you're a ginger.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 别担心 不过是对你红发的惩罚而已
